timeline.bodyText: Do we need to enforce that only one of these is set?
timeline.author: RatanRSur
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -121,7 +129,8 @@ public Transaction(
       final SECP256K1.Signature signature,
       final Bytes payload,
       final Address sender,
-      final Optional<BigInteger> chainId) {
+      final Optional<BigInteger> chainId,
+      final Optional<BigInteger> v) {

replies.bodyText: added this check. this is the only place where v gets set
replies.author: macfarla

timeline.bodyText: Is MAX supposed to be smaller than MIN here?
timeline.author: RatanRSur

replies.bodyText: max and min don't make a whole lot of sense (they are never compared) but I couldn't think of anything better
